ValidationRule.description: Only the owner of the case can close it. It excludes Inbound record type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Id <> Owner:User.Id, ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(Status,'Closed'), OR( BEGINS(RecordType.DeveloperName,'HU_'), BEGINS(RecordType.DeveloperName,'Talabat_') ), NOT(CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, '_Inbound_')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to close the case please Take Ownership.
